# 𓁶 𓊪 top ⇔ Haupt 𓁷 capital head

𓃾 | cow | ≈ Kopf? 𓈙 𓆑 𓄅 | ram's head | Schaf Schopf sheep ™ <> cheps cephalos Sebastian

capital > cephal Kopf
capital > Haupt > head
capital ⇔ capitare capture

𒌷 𒁁𒇻𒋾 URU be-lu-ti Cur Belati ≈ Car Pitale > capital 𒌷 𒁁𒇻𒋾 URU be-lu-ti car.phal ≈ cephal

capital Memphis PSM

The Greek forms of Egypt (Αἴγυπτος) were borrowed from Late Egyptian (Amarna) Hikuptah or "Memphis", a corruption of the earlier Egyptian name ⟨ḥwt-kȝ-ptḥ⟩ 𓉗𓏏𓉐𓂓𓏤𓊪𓏏𓎛 meaning "home of the ka (soul) of Ptah", the name of a temple to the god Ptah at Memphis.
